InhumanizingRitual.PsychicRitualDef_Inhu.label: inhumanize
InhumanizingRitual.PsychicRitualDef_Inhu.description: Inhumanize a person, dominating their mind with the psychic patterns of the void. Unfortunately, the disruptive effect of the ritual will induce a a break of humanity, and poor quality rituals will cause the target to fall into a coma.
InhumanizingRitual.PsychicRitualDef_Inhu.outcomeDescription: The target will experience a break of humanity and become inhumanized.\n\nWith the current ritual quality, the target will also enter a coma for {0}.
